foodstore.event.1930900001.1: Welcome to Market Town, @!!! Let's create a lively farmer's market and draw more visitors to our village!
foodstore.event.1930900001.2: You can also use your Building as a Store, but you'll need a License. I'll send you the a requirements letter to keep your business on track.
foodstore.event.1930900001.3: Oh, and good news!!!#$b#I fixed the boat by the Tide Pools. It can take you to Paradise Island northwest of Fern Islands.
foodstore.event.1930900001.4: It's currently empty but stunning island. With your touch, it could become the ultimate resort ever.
